Based on these cues, I recommend the movies "Aladdin" and "Tomorrow Never Dies". Both of these films feature Michael Paré and offer an exciting blend of comedy, music, and action. In "Aladdin", Paré plays a lovable street urchin who finds himself in a series of comedic and musical situations after being granted his greatest wish. In "Tomorrow Never Dies", Paré stars alongside Pierce Brosnan as a media mogul with a sinister plan to induce war between China and the UK. Both movies are sure to provide an entertaining and engaging viewing experience!

The user is interested in a movie with a terrorism theme, featuring Natalie Portman, and directed by Tom Tykwer. The language of the movie should be German.

Recommendation:
Based on the user's preferences, I highly recommend "The Odyssey" (1997) directed by Tom Tykwer. This epic film tells a 24-chapter story of Odysseus' journey home after the Trojan War, with a terrorism theme woven throughout the plot. The all-star cast features Vanessa L. Williams, Eric Roberts, Bernadette Peters, and more. Alternatively, "Shutter Island" (2010) also directed by Tom Tykwer is another great option, as it follows two US marshals investigating a disappearance at an isolated asylum, with a shocking twist at the end. Both movies are sure to provide an engaging and thought-provoking viewing experience!
